entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:10 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 6:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 53 %
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: SE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of rain in the morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and drizzle changing to a few flurries after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
